These exper______ varied i_ their sub____ area, and we__ both impo_____ in so__ cases a__ trivial i_ others. data.fullContent: The Society's first Secretary was Henry Oldenburg. Its early meetings included experiments performed first by Robert Hooke and then by Denis Papin, who was appointed in 1684. These experiments varied in their subject area, and were both important in some cases and trivial in others. The society began publication of Philosophical Transactions from 1665, the oldest and longest-running scientific journal in the world, which established the important principles of scientific priority and peer review.
data.answer: 该协会的第一任秘书是亨利·奥尔登堡。它早期的会议包括最初由罗伯特·胡克和1684年被任命的丹尼斯·帕平进行的实验。这些实验的主题领域各不相同，在某些情况下很重要，而在另一些情况下则微不足道。该协会从1665年开始出版《哲学学报》，这是世界上历史最悠久、运行时间最长的科学期刊，确立了科学优先和同行评议的重要原则。
